DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to comparatively assess the effectiveness of a tailored educational intervention to improve health literacy levels regarding upper respiratory infections (URIs) and to decrease pediatric emergency department (PED) visits, among Latino households in Early Head Start.
DOC.brief_title: Appropriate Care of URI (ACURI): Early Head Start
DOC.criteria: Attending an infant or toddler EHS group at participating site Participant in pilot study Participant in community intervention regarding URI
